import React from "react" import { UncontrolledButtonDropdown, DropdownMenu, DropdownItem, DropdownToggle, Card, CardHeader, CardBody, CardTitle, TabContent, TabPane, Nav, NavItem, NavLink } from "reactstrap" import classnames from "classnames" import { Eye, Code, ChevronDown } from "react-feather" import { dropdownBasic } from "./DropdownsSourceCode" class DropdownBasic extends React.Component { state = { activeTab: "1" } toggleTab = tab => { if (this.state.activeTab !== tab) { this.setState({ activeTab: tab }) } } render() { return ( Basic
{ this.toggleTab("1") }} > { this.toggleTab("2") }} >
Primary Option 1 Option 2 Option 3
Success Option 1 Option 2 Option 3
Info Option 1 Option 2 Option 3
Danger Option 1 Option 2 Option 3
Warning Option 1 Option 2 Option 3
Light Option 1 Option 2 Option 3
Dark Option 1 Option 2 Option 3
{dropdownBasic} ) } } export default DropdownBasic
